name: Stay The Night
summary: Zedd has teamed up with singer Hayley Williams of Paramore for his newest track “Stay The Night” and it sounds like one of the biggest house anthems of the year. Today we get the first preview with a clip teasing us with the catchy progressive house tune. This song is set to release apart of the deluxe edition of his debut album Clarity set to release September 24th.
info:
• 制作人: Zedd
  • 版本特性: Digital
  • 发售日期: 2013-09-10

  • 播放时长: 3:37
